title: 110 78 18 "Zero Tolerance""Merciless Mortal Combat! Luffy vs. Crocodile!"Transliteration: "Nasakemuyō no shitō! Rufi vs Kurokodairu!" (Japanese:情無用の死闘!ルフィVSクロコダイル) Yuji Endo Junki Takegami May 5, 2002(2002-05-05)[54] February 10, 2007[55][56]
